item.title: Projects
item.description: List of Projects that I’ve Done over time: Coursework Systems Programming Lab Compilers Lab Computer Organisation & Architecture Lab Networks Lab Operating Systems Lab DBMS Lab Internships / Competitions QNet (Research Internship at ISRO) Development of a Python Tutor Lunar Super Resolution üèÜ (Inter-IIT Tech Meet 11.0) Students’ Auditorium Management System An auditorium management website which runs on localhost and allows the user to maintain a database of shows to be screened, along with providing functionality for seat booking.
